## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6ae212af083dc32114fe6584d59ab57ac5b5c3b77d59d83cd62af05f8706cdf0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'azure-documentdb-node' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
